title: Navigating the AWS Agentic AI Marketplace: A Practical Guide
abstract: This hands-on workshop will guide you through the AWS Agentic AI Marketplace launched in July 2025. The workshop has two parts: first, participants will get to learn how to list their own agentic AI capabilities on AWS Marketplace. In the second part, we dive-deeper in a hands-on session format into the use of AI agents and tools available on the Marketplace. Participants will learn how to: - List their agentic AI related offerings - Avoid pitfalls and use best practices regarding marketplace - Navigate the marketplace interface to discover and evaluate AI agents for specific business needs - Compare different autonomous AI agents based on capabilities, pricing, and performance metrics - Deploy and configure agents for common enterprise use cases Prerequisites: - Basic AWS console familiarity - Understanding of fundamental AI/ML concepts - Active AWS account with appropriate permissions This is an intermediate-level workshop ideal for developers, solution architects, and technical decision-makers looking to leverage autonomous AI agents in their organizations, but also interested in how their work and own AI Agents can make it to the AWS Agentic AI Marketplace.
